attributes.action: Relax the UK DOMESTIC DRIVING regulation for supermarket delivery drivers
attributes.additional_details: Currently home shopping drivers can’t drive 18:00-22:00 And then the next day drive 08:00 to 18:00 due to the regulation. Relaxing will allow us to plan in more drivers and accommodate the vulnerability of customers who can’t  visit supermarkets. A maximum of 11 hours of shift time in a rolling 24 hour period current Is preventing supermarkets more flexibility to fill driving vacancies
attributes.background: We struggle to get driving shifts covered for home shopping service due to the domestic driving regulations. Relaxing this while the COVID-19 pandemic is in full swing will aid supermarkets to deliver more supplies to at risk customers

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the Government has announced the relaxation of drivers' hours rules where a journey is necessary for specific reasons: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/covid-19-guidance-on-drivers-hours-relaxations/coronavirus-covid-19-guidance-on-drivers-hours-relaxations
